verses.text: The \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \add were\add* in \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*:

To whom the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amon|strong="H0526"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, in the \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of his \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*.

It came also in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, unto the \w end|strong="H8552"\w* of the \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, unto the carrying \w away|strong="H1540"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* in the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.
Then the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Before|strong="H2962"\w* I \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* thee in the \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* thee; and before thou camest \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* I \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* thee, \add and\add* I \w ordained|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* unto the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft ordained: Heb. gave\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, \w Ah|strong="H0162"\w*, \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*! behold, I \w cannot|strong="H3045"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*: for I \add am\add* a \w child|strong="H5288"\w*.

¶ But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* not, I \add am\add* a \w child|strong="H5288"\w*: for thou shalt \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to all that I shall \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee, and whatsoever I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

Be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*: for I \add am\add* with thee to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Then the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*. And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Behold, I have \w put|strong="H5414"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w See|strong="H7200"\w*, I have this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w set|strong="H6485"\w* thee over the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* and over the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*, to root \w out|strong="H5428"\w*, and to pull \w down|strong="H5422"\w*, and to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w*, and to throw \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, to \w build|strong="H1129"\w*, and to \w plant|strong="H5193"\w*.

¶ Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, what \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* thou? And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w see|strong="H7200"\w* a \w rod|strong="H4731"\w* of an almond \w tree|strong="H8247"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto me, Thou hast \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*: for I will \w hasten|strong="H8245"\w* my \w word|strong="H1697"\w* to \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* it.

And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me the second \w time|strong="H8145"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* thou? And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w see|strong="H7200"\w* a \w seething|strong="H5301"\w* \w pot|strong="H5518"\w*; and the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* thereof \add is\add* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*.\f + \fr 1.13 \ft toward…: Heb. from the face of the north\f*

Then the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Out of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* shall break \w forth|strong="H6605"\w* upon all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 1.14 \ft shall…: Heb. shall be opened\f*

For, lo, I will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* all the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and they shall \w set|strong="H5414"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* at the \w entering|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and against all the \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and against all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And I will \w utter|strong="H1696"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* against them \w touching|strong="H5921"\w* all their \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, who have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and have burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of their own \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

¶ Thou therefore gird \w up|strong="H0247"\w* thy \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto them all that I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee: be not \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w* at their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*, lest I \w confound|strong="H2865"\w* thee \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.\f + \fr 1.17 \ft confound: or, break to pieces\f*

For, behold, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* have \w made|strong="H5414"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* a \w defenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and an \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w*, and \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* against the whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, against the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, against the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* thereof, against the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* thereof, and against the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And they shall \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against thee; but they shall not \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w* against thee; for I \add am\add* with thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee.
